en.bio: Pragmatic Data Engineer who transforms operational chaos into clean, reproducible software architectures. I don't just move data; I build Platforms. My approach is 'Engineering-First': designing container-native solutions with Docker, Python, and GCP to eliminate technical debt. Proven experience migrating legacy systems into high-performance pipelines (Batch/Streaming) leveraging Redpanda and dbt.

en.title: HONOR Venezuela
en.subtitle: Data Engineer
en.description:
Led the complete migration of data processes from Excel/WhatsApp to an engineered system with Database, REST API, and automated workflows.
- Migrated monthly Excel operations to a real PostgreSQL database, building a complete system with Flask + SQLAlchemy and REST API.
- Reduced manual data entry errors by ~90% by implementing multi-layer validation, data modeling, and automated ETL pipelines.
- Created an audit and tracking system previously non-existent with workflow states and approval tracking.
- Accelerated store creation from 1 week to minutes by automating bulk processes and developing CLI tools.
